title: What weapon should the next ADC use?
body:
There are countless archers, a lot of gun users, a spear thrower, a crossbow rat, double noxian ax chuckarangs, rockets and missiles, and hadoukens. What weapon should the next marksman use?

I would like to see a ninja-like character who throws kunai. Or someone who throws sticky bombs that they choose when to detonate (though that probably wouldn't work too well on an ADC, got the idea from Bomb King in Paladins, basically smaller Overwatch made by the guys who did Smite)

I had an idea for a laser ADC who had a "battery charge" which they had to work around, not unlike the ammunition of Graves and Jhin in its function. The idea is that they would be a tankbuster, and that based on their battery charge and target focus, their damage would increase. They'd also be a High Damage Low Mobility ADC ideally, with the whole idea being that the longer their beam hits a single target, the stronger the damage gets, however the nature of their AA type prevents things like Ruunaans, for example.
